020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.lang.String.CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER;
023import static java.util.Comparator.comparing;
024import static java.util.Locale.ROOT;
025import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.ABSTRACT;
026import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.DEFAULT;
027import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
028import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
029import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
030import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.STATIC;
031import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
032import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.CLASS_WITH_TOO_MANY_METHODS;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.TypeSpecImpl.Kind.ANNOTATION;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.createDebugOutput;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.requireExactlyOneOf;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.union;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.hash;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
044
045import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
046import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
047import java.util.Collection;
048import java.util.EnumSet;
049import java.util.HashSet;
050import java.util.Optional;
051import java.util.Set;
052
053import org.apiguardian.api.API;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.CodeBlock;
057import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.FieldSpec;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.JavaComposer;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.MethodSpec;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeSpec;
062
063/**
064 *  The implementation of
065 *  {@link TypeSpec}
066 *  for annotations.
067 *
068 *  @author Square,Inc.
069 *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
070 *  @version $Id: AnnotationTypeSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $
071 *  @since 0.2.0
072 *
073 *  @UMLGraph.link
074 */
075@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AnnotationTypeSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $" )
076@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
077public final class AnnotationTypeSpecImpl extends TypeSpecImpl
078{
079        /*---------------*\
080    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
081        \*---------------*/
082    /**
083     *  The implementation of
084     *  {@link Builder}
085     *  for annotation types.
086     *
087     *  @author Square,Inc.
088     *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
089     *  @version $Id: AnnotationTypeSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $
090     *  @since 0.2.0
091     *
092     *  @UMLGraph.link
093     */
094    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AnnotationTypeSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $" )
095    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
096    public static final class BuilderImpl extends TypeSpecImpl.BuilderImpl
097    {
098            /*--------------*\
099        ====** Constructors **=================================================
100            \*--------------*/
101        /**
102         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
103         *
104         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
105         *      builder instance.
106         *  @param  name    The name of the type to build.
107         */
108        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
109        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final CharSequence name )
110        {
111            this( composer, Optional.of( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ).toString() ) );
112        }   //  BuilderImpl()
113
114        /**
115         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
116         *
117         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
118         *      builder instance.
119         *  @param  name    The name of the type to build.
120         */
121        @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
122        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final Optional<String> name )
123        {
124            super( composer, ANNOTATION, name );
125        }   //  BuilderImpl()
126
127            /*---------*\
128        ====** Methods **======================================================
129            \*---------*/
130        /**
131         *  {@inheritDoc}
132         */
133        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
134        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
135        @Override
136        public final BuilderImpl addAttribute( final FieldSpec fieldSpec, final boolean readOnly )
137        {
138            throw new ValidationException( format( "Attributes are not allowed for annotation %s", getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ) ) );
139        }   //  addAttribute()
140
141        /**
142         *  {@inheritDoc}
143         */
144        @Override
145        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
146        public final BuilderImpl addField( final FieldSpec fieldSpec )
147        {
148            final var fieldSpecImpl = (FieldSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( fieldSpec, "fieldSpec" );
149            final var modifiers = fieldSpecImpl.modifiers();
150            requireExactlyOneOf( modifiers, PUBLIC, PRIVATE );
151            final Set<Modifier> check = EnumSet.of( STATIC, FINAL );
152            checkState( modifiers.containsAll( check ), () -> new ValidationException( format( "%s %s.%s requires modifiers %s", ANNOTATION, getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), fieldSpec.name(), check ) ) );
153            if( composer().addDebugOutput() )
154            {
155                final var builder = fieldSpecImpl.toBuilder();
156                createDebugOutput( true ).ifPresent( debug -> builder.addJavadoc( "\n$L\n", debug.asLiteral() ) );
157                super.addField( builder.build() );
158            }
159            else
160            {
161                super.addField( fieldSpecImpl );
162            }
163
164            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
165            return this;
166        }   //  addField()
167
168        /**
169         *  {@inheritDoc}
170         */
171        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
172        @Override
173        public final BuilderImpl addInitializerBlock( final CodeBlock block )
174        {
175            throw new UnsupportedOperationException( ANNOTATION + " can't have initializer blocks" );
176        }   //  addInitializerBlock()
177
178        /**
179         *  {@inheritDoc}
180         */
181        @Override
182        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
183        public final BuilderImpl addMethod( final MethodSpec methodSpec )
184        {
185            final var methodSpecImpl = (MethodSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( methodSpec, "methodSpec" );
186            checkState( methodSpecImpl.modifiers().equals( ANNOTATION.implicitMethodModifiers() ), () -> new IllegalStateException( format( "%s %s.%s requires modifiers %s", ANNOTATION, getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), methodSpecImpl.name(), ANNOTATION.implicitMethodModifiers() ) ) );
187            checkState( !methodSpecImpl.hasModifier( DEFAULT ), () -> new IllegalStateException(( format( "%s %s.%s cannot be default", ANNOTATION, getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), methodSpecImpl.name() ) ) ) );
188
189            final var methodSpecs = getMethodSpecs();
190            if( composer().addDebugOutput() )
191            {
192                final var builder = methodSpecImpl.toBuilder( false );
193                createDebugOutput( true ).ifPresent( debug -> builder.addJavadoc( "\n$L\n", debug.asLiteral() ) );
194                methodSpecs.add( builder.build() );
195            }
196            else
197            {
198                methodSpecs.add( methodSpecImpl );
199            }
200
201            final var maxMethods = composer().getMaxMethods();
202            if( (maxMethods > 0) && (methodSpecs.size() >= maxMethods) )
203            {
204                addSuppressableWarning( CLASS_WITH_TOO_MANY_METHODS );
205            }
206
207            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
208            return this;
209        }   //  addMethod()
210
211        /**
212         *  {@inheritDoc}
213         */
214        @Override
215        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
216        public final Builder addProperty( final FieldSpec fieldSpec, final boolean readOnly )
217        {
218            throw new ValidationException( format( "Properties are not allowed for annotation %s", getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ) ) );
219        }   //  addProperty()
220
221        /**
222         *  {@inheritDoc}
223         */
224        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
225        @Override
226       public final BuilderImpl addStaticBlock( final CodeBlock block )
227        {
228            throw new ValidationException( format( "Static Blocks are not allowed for annotation %s", getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ) ) );
229        }   //  addStaticBlock()
230
231        /**
232         *  {@inheritDoc}
233         */
234        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
235        @Override
236        public final AnnotationTypeSpecImpl build()
237        {
238            for( final var methodSpec : getMethodSpecs() )
239            {
240                checkState( methodSpec.hasModifier( ABSTRACT ), () -> new ValidationException( format( "Methods for Annotation %s have to be abstract: %s", getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), methodSpec.name() ) ) );
241            }
242
243            final var retValue = new AnnotationTypeSpecImpl( this );
244
245            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
246            return retValue;
247        }   //  build()
248
249        /**
250         *  {@inheritDoc}
251         */
252        @Override
253        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
254        public final BuilderImpl superclass( final TypeName superclass )
255        {
256            throw new IllegalStateException( "only classes have super classes, not " + ANNOTATION );
257        }   //  superclass()
258    }
259    //  class BuilderImpl
260
261        /*--------------*\
262    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
263        \*--------------*/
264    /**
265     *  Creates a new {@code TypeSpecImpl} instance.
266     *
267     *  @param  builder The builder for this instance.
268     */
269    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
270    public AnnotationTypeSpecImpl( final BuilderImpl builder )
271    {
272        super( builder );
273    }   //  AnnotationTypeSpecImpl()
274
275    /**
276     *  Creates a dummy type spec for type-resolution in CodeWriter only while
277     *  emitting the type declaration but before entering the type body.
278     *
279     *  @param  type    The source type.
280     */
281    @SuppressWarnings( {"unused", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
282    private AnnotationTypeSpecImpl( final AnnotationTypeSpecImpl type )
283    {
284        super( type );
285    }   //  AnnotationTypeSpecImpl()
286
287        /*---------*\
288    ====** Methods **==========================================================
289        \*---------*/
290    /**
291     *  {@inheritDoc}
292     */
293    @Override
294    protected final TypeSpecImpl createCopy() { return new AnnotationTypeSpecImpl( this ); }
295
296    /**
297     *  Emits the type to the given code writer, using the layout as defined
298     *  by the Foundation library code.
299     *
300     *  @param  codeWriter  The target code writer.
301     *  @param  enumName    The name of the enum; can be {@code null}.
302     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
303     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
304     *      output target.
305     */
306    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard", "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
307    protected final void emit4Foundation( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String enumName, final Set<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
308    {
309        assert isNull( enumName ) : "enumName has to be null";
310
311        /*
312         * Push an empty type (specifically without nested types) for
313         * type-resolution.
314         */
315        codeWriter.pushType( createCopy() );
316
317        codeWriter.emitJavadoc( getJavadoc() );
318        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( getAnnotations(), false );
319        codeWriter.emitModifiers( modifiers(), union( implicitModifiers, ANNOTATION.asMemberModifiers() ) );
320        codeWriter.emit( "$L $L", "@interface", name().get() );
321        codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( getTypeVariables() );
322
323        codeWriter.popType();
324
325        codeWriter.emit( "\n{\n" );
326
327        codeWriter.pushType( this );
328
329        //---* Emit the class body *-------------------------------------------
330        codeWriter.indent();
331        var firstMember = true;
332
333        //---* Emit the inner types *------------------------------------------
334        if( !innerClasses().isEmpty() )
335        {
336            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
337            codeWriter.emit(
338                """
339                    /*---------------*\\
340                ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
341                    \\*---------------*/""" );
342            innerClasses().stream()
343                .sorted( comparing( t -> t.name().get(), CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
344                .map( t -> (TypeSpecImpl) t)
345                .forEachOrdered( t ->
346                {
347                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
348                    t.emit( codeWriter, null, ANNOTATION.implicitTypeModifiers() );
349                } );
350            firstMember = false;
351        }
352
353        //--- Constants and attributes *---------------------------------------
354        if( !getFieldSpecs().isEmpty() )
355        {
356            final Collection<FieldSpecImpl> alreadyHandled = new HashSet<>();
357
358            //---* Emit the constants *----------------------------------------
359            final var constants = getFieldSpecs().stream()
360                .filter( f -> f.hasModifier( PUBLIC ) )
361                .filter( f -> f.hasModifier( STATIC ) )
362                .filter( f -> f.hasModifier( FINAL ) )
363                .filter( FieldSpecImpl::hasInitializer )
364                .sorted( comparing( FieldSpecImpl::name, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
365                .toList();
366
367            if( !constants.isEmpty() )
368            {
369                if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
370                codeWriter.emit(
371                    """    
372                        /*-----------*\\
373                    ====** Constants **========================================================
374                        \\*-----------*/""" );
375                constants.forEach( c ->
376                {
377                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
378                    c.emit( codeWriter, ANNOTATION.implicitFieldModifiers() );
379                    alreadyHandled.add( c );
380                } );
381                firstMember = false;
382            }
383
384            //---* Emit the attributes *---------------------------------------
385            final var attributes = getFieldSpecs().stream()
386                .filter( f -> !alreadyHandled.contains( f ) )
387                .filter( f -> !(f.hasModifier( STATIC ) && f.hasModifier( FINAL )) )
388                .sorted( comparing( FieldSpecImpl::name, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
389                .toList();
390
391            if( !attributes.isEmpty() )
392            {
393                if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
394                codeWriter.emit(
395                    """
396                        /*------------*\\
397                    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
398                        \\*------------*/""" );
399
400                attributes.forEach( a ->
401                {
402                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
403                    a.emit( codeWriter, ANNOTATION.implicitFieldModifiers() );
404                    alreadyHandled.add( a );
405                } );
406                firstMember = false;
407            }
408
409            //---* Static fields *---------------------------------------------
410            final var statics = getFieldSpecs().stream()
411                .filter( f -> !alreadyHandled.contains( f ) )
412                .sorted( comparing( FieldSpecImpl::name, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
413                .toList();
414            if( !statics.isEmpty() || !getStaticBlock().isEmpty() )
415            {
416                if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
417                codeWriter.emit(
418                    """
419                        /*------------------------*\\
420                    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
421                        \\*------------------------*/""" );
422
423                statics.forEach( s ->
424                {
425                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
426                    s.emit( codeWriter, ANNOTATION.implicitFieldModifiers() );
427                    alreadyHandled.add( s );
428                } );
429
430                //---* Static Block *------------------------------------------
431                if( !getStaticBlock().isEmpty() )
432                {
433                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
434                    codeWriter.emit( getStaticBlock() );
435                }
436                firstMember = false;
437            }
438        }
439
440        //---* Constructors *--------------------------------------------------
441        final var constructors = getMethodSpecs().stream()
442            .filter( MethodSpecImpl::isConstructor )
443            .sorted( comparing( MethodSpecImpl::toString, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
444            .toList();
445        if( !getInitializerBlock().isEmpty() || !constructors.isEmpty() )
446        {
447            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
448            codeWriter.emit(
449                """
450                    /*--------------*\\
451                ====** Constructors **=====================================================
452                    \\*--------------*/""" );
453
454            //---* Initializer block *-----------------------------------------
455            if( !getInitializerBlock().isEmpty() )
456            {
457                codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
458                codeWriter.emit( getInitializerBlock() );
459            }
460
461            //---* Emit the constructors *-------------------------------------
462            constructors.forEach( c ->
463            {
464                codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
465                c.emit( codeWriter, name(), ANNOTATION.implicitMethodModifiers() );
466            } );
467            firstMember = false;
468        }
469
470        //---* Methods (static and non-static) *-------------------------------
471        final var methods = getMethodSpecs().stream()
472            .filter( m -> !m.isConstructor() )
473            .sorted( TypeSpecImpl::compareMethodSpecs )
474            .toList();
475        if( !methods.isEmpty() )
476        {
477            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
478            codeWriter.emit(
479                """
480                    /*------------*\\
481                ====** Attributes **=======================================================
482                    \\*------------*/""" );
483
484            methods.forEach( m ->
485            {
486                codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
487                m.emit( codeWriter, name(), ANNOTATION.implicitMethodModifiers() );
488            } );
489        }
490
491        codeWriter.unindent();
492        codeWriter.popType();
493
494        codeWriter.emit(
495            """
496            }
497            //  $L $N
498            """, ANNOTATION.name().toLowerCase( ROOT ), this );
499    }   //  emit4Foundation()
500
501    /**
502     *  Emits the type to the given code writer, using the layout as defined
503     *  by the original JavaPoet code.
504     *
505     *  @param  codeWriter  The target code writer.
506     *  @param  enumName    The name of the enum; can be {@code null}.
507     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
508     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
509     *      output target.
510     */
511    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard", "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
512    protected final void emit4JavaPoet( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String enumName, final Set<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
513    {
514        assert isNull( enumName ) : "enumName has to be null";
515
516        /*
517         * Push an empty type (specifically without nested types) for
518         * type-resolution.
519         */
520        codeWriter.pushType( createCopy() );
521
522        codeWriter.emitJavadoc( getJavadoc() );
523        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( getAnnotations(), false );
524        codeWriter.emitModifiers( modifiers(), union( implicitModifiers, ANNOTATION.asMemberModifiers() ) );
525        codeWriter.emit( "$L $L", "@interface", name().get() );
526        codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( getTypeVariables() );
527
528        codeWriter.popType();
529
530        codeWriter.emit( " {\n" );
531
532        codeWriter.pushType( this );
533
534        //---* Emit the class body *-------------------------------------------
535        codeWriter.indent();
536        var firstMember = true;
537
538        //---* Static fields *-------------------------------------------------
539        for( final var fieldSpec : getFieldSpecs() )
540        {
541            if( !fieldSpec.hasModifier( STATIC ) ) continue;
542            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
543            fieldSpec.emit( codeWriter, ANNOTATION.implicitFieldModifiers() );
544            firstMember = false;
545        }
546
547        if( !getStaticBlock().isEmpty() )
548        {
549            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
550            codeWriter.emit( getStaticBlock() );
551            firstMember = false;
552        }
553
554        //--* Non-static fields *----------------------------------------------
555        for( final var fieldSpec : getFieldSpecs() )
556        {
557            if( fieldSpec.hasModifier( STATIC ) ) continue;
558            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
559            fieldSpec.emit( codeWriter, ANNOTATION.implicitFieldModifiers() );
560            firstMember = false;
561        }
562
563        //---* Initializer block *---------------------------------------------
564        if( !getInitializerBlock().isEmpty() )
565        {
566            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
567            codeWriter.emit( getInitializerBlock() );
568            firstMember = false;
569        }
570
571        //---* Constructors *--------------------------------------------------
572        for( final var methodSpec : getMethodSpecs() )
573        {
574            if( !methodSpec.isConstructor() ) continue;
575            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
576            methodSpec.emit( codeWriter, name(), ANNOTATION.implicitMethodModifiers() );
577            firstMember = false;
578        }
579
580        //---* Methods (static and non-static) *-------------------------------
581        for( final var methodSpec : getMethodSpecs() )
582        {
583            if( methodSpec.isConstructor() ) continue;
584            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
585            methodSpec.emit( codeWriter, name(), ANNOTATION.implicitMethodModifiers() );
586            firstMember = false;
587        }
588
589        //---* Types (inner classes) *-----------------------------------------
590        for( final var typeSpec : innerClasses() )
591        {
592            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
593            ((TypeSpecImpl) typeSpec).emit( codeWriter, null, ANNOTATION.implicitTypeModifiers() );
594            firstMember = false;
595        }
596
597        codeWriter.unindent();
598        codeWriter.popType();
599
600        codeWriter.emit( "}\n" );
601    }   //  emit4JavaPoet()
602
603    /**
604     *  {@inheritDoc}
605     */
606    @Override
607    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
608    {
609        var retValue = this == o;
610        if( !retValue && (o instanceof AnnotationTypeSpecImpl other) )
611        {
612            retValue = getFactory().equals( other.getFactory() ) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
613        }
614
615        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
616        return retValue;
617    }   //  equals()
618
619    /**
620     *  {@inheritDoc}
621     */
622    @Override
623    public final int hashCode() { return hash( getFactory(), toString() ); }
624
625    /**
626     *  {@inheritDoc}
627     */
628    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
629    @Override
630    public final BuilderImpl toBuilder()
631    {
632        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( getFactory(), name() );
633        retValue.getJavadoc().addWithoutDebugInfo( getJavadoc() );
634        retValue.getAnnotations().addAll( getAnnotations() );
635        retValue.getModifiers().addAll( modifiers() );
636        retValue.getTypeVariables().addAll( getTypeVariables() );
637        retValue.getSuperinterfaces().addAll( getSuperInterfaces() );
638        retValue.getFieldSpecs().addAll( getFieldSpecs() );
639        retValue.getMethodSpecs().addAll( getMethodSpecs() );
640        retValue.getTypeSpecs().addAll( typeSpecs() );
641        retValue.getInitializerBlock().addWithoutDebugInfo( getInitializerBlock() );
642        retValue.getStaticBlock().addWithoutDebugInfo( getStaticBlock() );
643        retValue.getStaticImports().addAll( getStaticImports() );
644
645        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
646        return retValue;
647    }   //  toBuilder()
648}
649//  class AnnotationSpecImpl
650
651/*
652 *  End of File
653 */
